articles.content: To meet Amal Clooney at work is to meet one half of her, the Amal before the Clooney happened. She wants to talk about womens rights, and she is authoritative and disturbing in what she says: her fea… [+515 chars]

articles.title: Princess Beatrice is elegant in £320 Self Portrait dress at garden party - Daily Mail
articles.description: For the garden party at Buckingham Palace, mother-of-one Princess Beatrice picked a checked dress from the trendy label Self Portrait, which she paired with a statement headband.
articles.content:
